name: Artifact Red-X Hybrid Strategy Game PC, iOS, Linux & MAC
blurb: Hybrid empire-builder & squad combat. DRM Free. PC & iOS Platforms. ##Expanded to include Linux & Mac##

rewards.reward: No Reward
iOS copy of Artifact Red-X
Pre-order a Full Release digital copy of the game.\r\nContributor credit.

Full Release digital copy of the game. Official thank you from the team. Contributor honor bonus (random in game bonus given to you each time you play). 5 soldiers & 20 scientists for each new game you play. A Beta access key. Bonus 'contributor' weapon upgrade. Unlock contributor region and extra content (See stretch goals and game content for planned extras)

Special Edition\r\n-----------------------------------------------\r\nSpecial Edition Digital Download version of the game - Includes: Additional special release features, additional maps, SE UI & advanced sound track . 1 week early release. Official thank you from the team. Contributor honor bonus (random in game bonus given to you each time you play). 5 soldiers & 20 scientists for each new game you play. 5 Beta access keys. Bonus 'contributor' weapon upgrade. Unlock contributor region and extra content (See stretch goals and game content for planned extras)

Companion guide. Alpha & Stress test invites. Have your name appear randomly on an in game solider. Special Edition Digital Download version of the game. Official thank you from the team. 1 week early release. Contributor honor bonus. 10 Engineers, 15 Workers, 10 soldiers & 20 scientists for each new game you play. 10 Beta access keys. Bonus 'contributor' weapon upgrade. Unlock contributor region and extra content (See stretch goals and game content for planned extras).
Official Artifact Red-X Contributor Key Chain & a Poster \r\nAll previous rewards

Soldier of Fortune
-----------------------------------------------
All new soldiers are automatically promoted to the second rank on all difficulties. Unlock special high powered assault weapon - special contributor class. Companion guide. Alpha & Stress test invites. Have your name appear randomly on an in game solider. Special Edition Digital Download version of the game. 1 week early release. 
Contributor honor bonus. 10 Engineers, 15 Workers, 10 soldiers & 20 scientists for each new game you play. 10 Beta access keys. 5 Bonus 'contributor' weapon upgrade. Unlock contributor region and extra content (See stretch goals and game content for planned extras).
More Games Tier ------------------------------ Get 2 extra copies of the digital game to give to your friends. Early Alpha invites for you and your 2 friends. All Soldier of Fortune rewards
Upgrade My Special Edition------------------------------  Supporter T-shirt and all 'special edition rewards'

Like A Boss ------------------------------------------------------------
Assign your best soldier as the 'boss' to gain additional in game bonuses to help your squad on the battlefield. As this soldier 'evolves' it will develop a seed patch that will allow you to spread this ability to another when the time is right. You will always be able to provide this bonus to at least one soldier in every game you play. 

All 'More Games Tier' rewards

Rapid Response
-----------------------------------------------
All of your aircraft receive +speed bonuses. Your aircraft will intercept your opponents faster. All unmanned and mounted units also receive this bonus. Can be used in multiplayer (once stretch goals reached). Unlock contributor resource gems - an alternative for Artifact Red:X as a power source for medium-tech weaponry. 

All 'Like  a Boss Rewards"
Special Edition as a physical boxed version of Artifact Red-X on the platform of your choosing (Excluding iOS as it is only digital) All previous rewards
Proud Special Edition ----------------------------------------- A game supporter cap to show off your support. All 'Upgrade My Special Edition' rewards
More Fellas\r\nAll  (5) of the 4 aliens or human miniatures (excludes the Serpent Series)

More Games Tier ------------------------------\r\nGet 3 extra copies of the digital game to give to your friends. Early Alpha invites for you and your 3 friends. Digital Soundtrack & Making of game videos. All new soldiers are automatically promoted to the second rank on all difficulties. Unlock special high powered assault weapon - special contributor class. Companion guide. Alpha & Stress test invites. Have your name appear randomly on an in game solider. Special Edition Digital Download version of the game. 1 week early release. \r\nContributor honor bonus. 10 Engineers, 15 Workers, 10 soldiers & 20 scientists for each new game you play. 10 Beta access keys. 5 Bonus 'contributor' weapon upgrade. Unlock contributor region and extra content (See stretch goals and game content for planned extras).
Your very own squad patch\r\nAll Previous Rewards (including the cap, T-shirt, poster & Key chain)

I prefer to Roll\r\n-----------------------------------------------\r\nDon't want to be in the game how about influence the design and name an unmanned vehicle - decide the vehicle's attack ability and if it can hold passengers & their abilities while on the vehicle! All of your aircraft receive +speed bonuses. Your aircraft will intercept your opponents faster. All unmanned and mounted units also receive this bonus. Can be used in multiplayer (once stretch goals reached). A Limited Edition copy of the game. Bonus ability unlocked for your 'boss' solider. Early Alpha invites for you and your 5 friends. Digital Soundtrack & Making of game videos. All new soldiers are automatically promoted to the third rank on all difficulties. Unlock special high powered assault weapon - special contributor class. Companion guide. Alpha & Stress test invites. Have your name appear randomly on an in game solider. Special Edition Digital Download version of the game. 1 week early release. Contributor honor bonus. 10 Engineers, 15 Workers, 10 soldiers & 20 scientists for each new game you play. 10 Beta access keys. 5 Bonus 'contributor' weapon upgrade. Unlock contributor region and extra content (See stretch goals and game content for planned extras).

Ima Hero!
------------------------------------------------
Have your 'likeness' appear on either a soldier, scientist or engineer named after you. Have your name as one of the default soldiers in game. This soldier will be awarded a bonus YOU decide as well as  make him glow in game - team mates in proximity receive proxy bonuses and faster regen. All of your aircraft receive +speed bonuses. Your aircraft will intercept your opponents faster. All unmanned and mounted units also receive this bonus. Can be used in multiplayer (once stretch goals reached).
A Limited Edition copy of the game. Bonus ability unlocked for your 'boss' solider. Early Alpha invites for you and your 5 friends. Digital Soundtrack & Making of game videos. All new soldiers are automatically promoted to the third rank on all difficulties. Unlock special high powered assault weapon - special contributor class. Companion guide. Alpha & Stress test invites. Have your name appear randomly on an in game solider. Special Edition Digital Download version of the game. 1 week early release. Contributor honor bonus. 10 Engineers, 15 Workers, 10 soldiers & 20 scientists for each new game you play. 10 Beta access keys. 5 Bonus 'contributor' weapon upgrade. Unlock contributor region and extra content (See stretch goals and game content for planned extras).

Swag for me posse \r\n----------------------------------------------- \r\nLimited Edition game and Multiplayer Pack provided for free with 3 additional Special Edition games to give to your friends so you can really play multiplayer (we hate when you have to buy more copies just to play with friends!) You and your friends get T-shirts and caps with their game handles embroidered with the logo (4 T-shirts & 4 Caps). (Stretch Goal must be met for pack download to be possible. Physical goods will still be available.). All 'Ima Hero' Rewards
Your very own soldier Dog Tags \r\nAll Previous Rewards (including 5 caps, 5 T-shirst, poster, squad patch, & Key chain)
LIKE A BOSS PROMO - First 20 contributors who take this reward AUTOMATICALLY GET PROMOTED TO 'LIMITED EDITION' REWARD TIER!!!!
HERO PROMO - First 10 contributors who take this reward AUTOMATICALLY GET BOTH 'I PREFER TO ROLL' & 'IMA HERO' REWARDS.
EXTENDED PROMO - LIKE A BOSS PROMO - This promo was so popular it is back! contributors who take this reward AUTOMATICALLY GET PROMOTED TO 'LIMITED EDITION' REWARD TIER!!!!

**LIMITED EDITION***
-----------------------------------------------
Name an alien artifact, totem or idol and have a say in the design, what it does and the bonuses it provides players.
A Limited Edition copy of the game - Provided on a custom themed USB stick, signed box, manuals and a special surprise!  Bonus aircraft unlocked. Bonus ability unlocked for your 'boss' solider.  All 'Swag for me posse' rewards
Help set up the planet's attributes for the Alien Species named after you. Have a say as to the design and give feedback throughout the development process on your species. \r\nAll Previous Rewards

Serious Supporter Tier
-----------------------------------------------
Set of all resin-cast aliens found in the game - 8 species. Sizes range approx. 7 - 18 Inches, packaged with an exclusive 'Serious Supporter Game Edition with special bonuses, signed display for your sculptures - See photos in updates. Help set up the planet's attributes for the Alien Species named after you. Have a say as to the design and give feedback throughout the development process on your species. Early beta testing for you and 7 friends (Additional 4 copies provided). Your feedback will be used to improve the game where possible.  A special bonus will be given to players who pick the region named after you for their first base - a bonus you get to decide upon.
You and your friends get T-shirts and caps with their game handles embroidered with the logo (4 T-shirts & 4 Caps) A Limited Edition copy of the game. Bonus ability unlocked for your 'boss' solider. Early Alpha invites for you and your 5 friends. Digital Soundtrack & Making of game videos. All new soldiers are automatically promoted to the third rank on all difficulties. Unlock special high powered assault weapon - special contributor class. Companion guide. Alpha & Stress test invites. Have your name appear randomly on an in game solider. Special Edition Digital Download version of the game. 1 week early release. Contributor honor bonus. 10 Engineers, 15 Workers, 10 soldiers & 20 scientists for each new game you play. 10 Beta access keys. 5 Bonus 'contributor' weapon upgrade. Unlock contributor region and extra content (See stretch goals and game content for planned extras).
